head.episode: The Siege of the North, Part 2

scene.sd: Appa lands. Katara slides off. Close-up of Zuko.
scene.sp: ZukoThrowing the tied-up Aang aside who yelps. Here for a rematch?
KataraConfidently while countering his fire blasts. Trust me Zuko, it's not going to be much of a match.
scene.sd: Katara uses waterbending to launch Zuko into the air before plummeting him down to the ground, knocking him out. Close-up shot of Sokka running toward Aang to untie him with Zuko lying unconscious.
scene.sp: SokkaHey, this is some quality rope!
AangWe need to get to the oasis; the spirits are in trouble!
scene.sd: Switch to a wide-view of the area with Aang airbending himself atop Appa. Close-up shot of Aang landing on Appa.
scene.sp: AangWait, we can't just leave him here.
AangNo, if we leave him he'll die.
scene.sd: Aang airbends himself off Appa and retrieves Zuko, bringing him to Appa.
scene.sp: SokkaSarcastically. Yeah, this makes a lot of sense. Let's bring the guy who's constantly trying to kill us.
